attributes.action: STOP HMRC HAVING DEALING AND PASS IT BACK TO THE DWP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am totally dismayed that since hmrc has had dealings/ taken over the wtc & ctc claims and payments that there has been a rise in fraudulent claims, they cant keep data securely, and that they are incompetent at getting the correct payments to the right people, since submitting my claim, i recieve atleast one letter every week with the amounts differing, this has led to me being worse off than when it started, and yet they said we would be better off, where ?, i,m currently on the verges of declaring myself bankrupt because of the whole situation and am contemplating even giving up work as i would be better off, than working, but i prefer going and earning my money and not relying on state handouts

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
